dmca.title: Apple Computer Cease and Desist Letter
dmca.body:
Dear [private],

It was a pleasure talking with you last Thursday regarding the web site [redacted] which contains the Apple commercial "Think different".

As you agreed during our discussion, the display of the Apple commercial created by the ad agency [redacted] is a direct infringement of Apple's copyrights, and further, you have agreed to have the web master remove it from the site. Per your request, this letter is to memorialize that agreement.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards, 



[private]     
Trademark Counsel 
                
APPLE COMPUTER, INC.
[redacted]
voice: [private]
fax: [private]
